# UITextDropProposal.Performer.view

**Case**

A performer type that indicates that the text view is responsible for doing the drop operation.

## Declaration

```swift
case view
```

## Discussion

This performer is the default for a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextDropProposal] object. If this performer is used, the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextDropDelegate/textDroppableView(_:willPerformDrop:)] method is called (if implemented). However, implementing the delegate method isn’t required when using this performer.

## Performers

- **UITextDropProposal.Performer.delegate**: A performer type that indicates the delegate object is responsible for doing the drop operation.
